name: Ribbon Zap
description:
Description

100 levels of colorful, fast-paced shoot 'em up action.

Instructions

Destroy as much as you can. Do not die.

Controls:

Left and right movement: A+D, arrow keys or gamepad left stick.
Bullets fire automatically.
Smartbomb: Spacebar or gamepad A button.
Pause: P or gamepad B button.

HUD display:

Left: score.
Centre: current level, remaining lives.
Right: level progress, shield amount and smartbomb count.

Assists:

Fly thru power-up towers to activate limited-time bonuses or grab extra smartbombs.
Extra life gained every 100 million points.
Bonus points for destroying all enemies in a group.

Credits

Code and artwork by Lee Burrows.

Sound effects edited by Lee Burrows from assorted creative commons sources.

Music by Gravity Sound.
